1965 marthu mathiwaranayedi sarath komiyunist pakshayen rathnapura aasanayata tharaga wadima sandaha nama yojana illuwath ee sandaha ohuta ida prastha nolabini, in adhairyayata path nowu sarath swadhinawa ema asunata idiripath wi shri lanka nidahas pakshaye apekshakayata wada wadi chanda pramanayak laba ganna ladi. 1970 marthu 25 wana dina agamathi dadli senanayaka mahatha siya rajaya wisuruwa harina ladi. 1970 mahamathiwaranayedi kalawana aasanaye samagi peramune apekshakaya washayen sarath muththettuwegama mahatha idiripath karana lada athara, ohu wadi chanda 4795 kin ema aasanaya jaya ganna ladi.
owun e් sandaha anugamanaya kala ka්ramopaya wuye samajawadayata erehi aragalaya sowiyat deshayada padanam karaganimin leninwadayatada pahara pita pahara dimaya.
